fields.title: Dashboard Overview
fields.description: Your personalized command center for tracking your whole life journey.
fields.content:
## Welcome to Your Dashboard

The Dashboard is your personal command center. It provides:

- **Daily insights** personalized to your activity
- **Quick stats** showing your progress
- **Gentle nudges** when you've been away too long
- **Celebrations** for your achievements

### Quick Stats

At the top of your dashboard, you'll see quick stats including:
- Journal streak (consecutive days of journaling)
- Active goals
- Tasks completed today
- Active prayer requests (if Faith module is enabled)

### AI Insights

If you have AI features enabled in your Preferences, you'll see personalized insights based on your recent activity.

### Getting Started

1. Click on any module in the navigation to explore that area.
2. Use the quick action buttons to create new entries.
3. Check back daily to build your streaks!

fields.title: Getting Around the App
fields.description: Learn how to navigate Whole Life Journey.
fields.content:
## Navigating Whole Life Journey

### Main Navigation

Use the top navigation bar to access different modules:

1. **Dashboard** - Your home base with daily insights
2. **Journal** - Record your thoughts and reflections
3. **Faith** - Track prayers, scripture, and spiritual milestones
4. **Health** - Monitor weight, fasting, and fitness
5. **Life** - Manage projects, tasks, and events
6. **Purpose** - Set goals and annual directions

### User Menu

Click your avatar in the top-right corner to access:
- **Profile** - Update your name and avatar
- **Preferences** - Customize themes, modules, and AI settings
- **Sign Out** - Log out of your account

### Help System

Click the **?** icon in the navigation for context-specific help on any page.

### Mobile Navigation

On mobile devices, tap the menu icon (☰) to open the navigation drawer.

fields.title: Journal Overview
fields.description: Track your daily thoughts, moods, and reflections.
fields.content:
## Your Journal

The Journal module helps you build a daily reflection practice.

### Creating an Entry

1. Click the **"New Entry"** button in the top-right corner.
2. Enter a title for your entry.
3. Select your current mood from the dropdown.
4. Write your thoughts in the body field.
5. (Optional) Add categories to organize your entry.
6. Click **"Save"** to create your entry.

### Viewing Entries

Your entries are displayed in reverse chronological order (newest first).

- Click on any entry title to view the full content.
- Use the calendar view to see entries by date.
- Filter entries by mood or category.

### Journal Streaks

Build a journaling habit! Your dashboard shows how many consecutive days you've written entries.

### Tips for Journaling

- Write at the same time each day to build a habit.
- Don't worry about length—even a few sentences count.
- Use the mood tracker to notice patterns over time.

fields.title: Health Tracking Overview
fields.content:
## Health Module

Track your physical wellness with these features:

### Weight Tracking

1. Click **"Log Weight"** to record a new measurement.
2. Enter your weight and the date/time.
3. View your progress on the weight chart.

### Fasting

1. Click **"Start Fast"** to begin a fasting window.
2. Click **"End Fast"** when you break your fast.
3. View your fasting history and patterns.

### Glucose (Blood Sugar)

1. Click **"Log Glucose"** to record a reading.
2. Note whether it's fasting, post-meal, or random.
3. Track patterns over time.

### Fitness

1. Log workouts with type, duration, and notes.
2. Track your exercise consistency.
3. View workout history.

fields.title: Faith Module Overview
fields.description: Nurture your spiritual life with prayer tracking and scripture reflection.
fields.content:
## Faith Module

Grow in your spiritual journey with these tools:

### Prayer Requests

1. Click **"New Prayer"** to add a prayer request.
2. Set priority (Normal or Urgent).
3. Mark prayers as answered when God responds.
4. View your answered prayer history.

### Faith Milestones

Record significant spiritual moments:
- Salvation
- Baptism
- Answered prayers
- Spiritual insights
- Community moments

### Scripture

Reflect on Bible passages:
1. Search for verses by reference.
2. Save favorite passages.
3. Add personal notes and reflections.

### Daily Encouragement

Faith-specific encouragements appear on your dashboard when this module is enabled.

fields.title: Preferences Overview
fields.description: Customize your Whole Life Journey experience.
fields.content:
## Preferences

Personalize your experience with these settings:

### Theme

Choose a visual theme that matches your style:
- **Minimal** - Clean and focused
- **Faith** - Warm, spiritually grounded
- **Sports** - Bold and performance-driven
- **Nature** - Calm and organic
- **Outdoors** - Adventurous and expansive

### Accent Color

Pick a custom accent color for buttons and highlights.

### Module Toggles

Enable or disable modules based on what matters to you:
- Journal
- Faith
- Health
- Life
- Purpose

### AI Settings

- Enable/disable AI-powered insights
- Choose a coaching style (Supportive, Direct, Gentle, etc.)

### Timezone

Set your timezone for accurate streak tracking and date displays.

fields.title: Life Module Overview
fields.description: Manage the daily operating layer of your life.
fields.content:
## Life Module

Organize your daily life with these powerful tools:

### Projects

Track larger initiatives with multiple steps:

1. Click **"New Project"** to create a project.
2. Set status (Active, Paused, Completed).
3. Add tasks to break down the work.
4. Track progress as you complete tasks.

### Tasks

Manage your to-do list:

1. Create tasks with priority levels (Now, Soon, Later).
2. Assign due dates for time-sensitive items.
3. Link tasks to projects for organization.
4. Mark tasks complete as you finish them.

### Events

Track important dates and appointments:

1. Add life events with dates and times.
2. Set reminders for upcoming events.
3. View your week at a glance.

### Additional Features

- **Inventory** - Track your belongings
- **Pets** - Manage pet records and care
- **Recipes** - Save your favorite recipes
- **Documents** - Store important documents

fields.title: Purpose Module Overview
fields.description: Define your direction and set meaningful goals.
fields.content:
## Purpose Module

Connect with your deeper motivations and long-term direction:

### Annual Direction

Set your focus for the year:

1. Choose a **Word of the Year** - a guiding theme.
2. Write your **Core Theme** - what you want to accomplish.
3. Define your **Focus Areas** - key life domains.
4. Review and adjust throughout the year.

### Life Goals

Set and track meaningful goals:

1. Click **"New Goal"** to create a goal.
2. Add milestones to break it into steps.
3. Track progress as you advance.
4. Celebrate when goals are completed.

### Change Intentions

Capture things you want to change:

1. Record areas for personal growth.
2. Set intentions for positive change.
3. Review periodically for accountability.

### Reflection

Use the Purpose module for periodic life reviews to ensure your daily actions align with your deeper values.

fields.title: Your Profile
fields.description: View and manage your account information.
fields.content:
## Your Profile

View your account details and activity summary.

### Profile Information

Your profile displays:
- **Name** - Your display name throughout the app
- **Email** - Your login email address
- **Avatar** - Your profile picture
- **Member since** - When you joined

### Activity Summary

Quick stats show your engagement:
- Journal entries created
- Prayer requests (if Faith enabled)
- Health measurements logged

### Editing Your Profile

Click **"Edit Profile"** to update:
- Your name
- Email address
- Profile picture (avatar)

### Account Security

To change your password, use the password reset option from the login page.

fields.title: Admin Console Overview
fields.description: Manage your Whole Life Journey site.
fields.content:
## Admin Console

Welcome to the Admin Console - your central hub for site management.

### Quick Stats

The dashboard shows key metrics:
- Total users
- Total journal entries
- Active themes
- Categories defined

### Management Sections

**Site Configuration**
Control site-wide settings like branding, registration options, and default theme.

**Themes**
Create and customize visual themes with light and dark mode colors.

**Categories**
Manage content categories for organizing journal entries.

**Users**
View and manage user accounts.

**Choice Categories**
Define dropdown options used throughout the app.

**Test History** (Dev only)
View test run history and results.

### Django Admin

For advanced database access, click **"Django Admin"** to access the full Django admin interface.

fields.title: Site Configuration
fields.content:
## Site Configuration

Control your site's appearance and behavior.

### Branding

- **Site Name** - Displayed in the browser title bar and headers
- **Tagline** - Shown on the landing page
- **Logo** - Upload a custom logo (recommended: 200x64 pixels)
- **Favicon** - Your browser tab icon (32x32 PNG)

### Registration Settings

- **Allow Registration** - Enable or disable new user signups
- **Require Email Verification** - Force users to verify their email
- **Faith Enabled by Default** - Whether new users have Faith module enabled

### Default Theme

Select which theme new users will see by default.

### Footer & Legal

- **Footer Text** - Copyright notice
- **Privacy Policy URL** - Link to your privacy policy
- **Terms URL** - Link to your terms of service

### Saving Changes

Click **Save Configuration** at the bottom. Changes take effect immediately.

fields.title: Theme Management
fields.content:
## Theme Management

Themes control the visual appearance of your site.

### Theme Properties

- **Name** - Displayed to users in preferences
- **Slug** - Unique identifier (lowercase, no spaces)
- **Description** - Brief description of the theme's style
- **Sort Order** - Display position in theme picker

### Color Settings

Each theme has colors for both light and dark modes:

**Primary Colors**
- Primary - Main brand color
- Secondary - Supporting color
- Accent - Highlight color for buttons, links

**Text Colors**
- Text - Main body text
- Text Muted - Secondary/subdued text

**Background Colors**
- Background - Page background
- Surface - Card/panel backgrounds
- Border - Lines and dividers

### Creating a Theme

1. Click **"Add Theme"**
2. Fill in the name, slug, and description
3. Set all color values using hex codes (#ffffff)
4. Check **Active** to make it available to users
5. Click **Save**

### Tips

- Test themes in both light and dark mode
- Ensure good contrast for accessibility
- Preview changes before activating

fields.title: User Management
fields.content:
## User Management

View and manage all user accounts.

### User List

The user list shows:
- Name and email
- Staff/admin status
- Date joined
- Last login

### User Details

Click on a user to view:
- Account information
- Activity statistics
- Preference settings

### Staff Status

Users with **Staff** status can:
- Access the Admin Console
- Access the Django Admin
- Manage site content

### Creating Users

To create new admin users, use the Django Admin interface.

### Security Notes

- Only grant staff access to trusted users
- Review user activity periodically
- Use strong passwords
